long_description: The Louis Garneau Electra 2 bike jacket for men keeps you protected on mild days as you ride or run. The sleeves are detachable so the jacket quickly converts to a vest when the temperature rises. Lightweight, breathable fabric provides wind protection and is water resistant; sleeves zip off to convert jacket to a vest. Micromesh lining wicks moisture. Two-way zipper offers maximum ventilation; zipper garage prevents skin irritation. Zippered chest pocket with reflectivity; rear pocket has zipper and flap; multimedia pocket allows cord to be channelled inside. Louis Garneau Electra 2 bike jacket for men offers excellent front and back reflectivity, adjustable hem. Tab allows you to clip on a mini light (not included).
short_description: The Louis Garneau Electra 2 bike jacket for men keeps you protected on mild days as you ride or run. The sleeves are detachable so the jacket quickly converts to a vest when the temperature rises.
